details.location: King Fahd University of Petroleum and Minerals, Dhahran, Saudi Arabia
details.extension: Possibility of extension for an additional two years based on performance and mutual agreement
qualifications: Must have, or be near completion of, a Ph.D. in Computer Science, Software Engineering, or a closely related field
Candidates currently holding postdoc positions are encouraged to apply
details.application_method: Send CV or inquiries to the contact email
